alert.note: Alert for New York (Manhattan) (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 17 at 2:35PM EST until December 18 at 6:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Around 1 ft of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline with the Monday afternoon high tide * WHERE...New York (Manhattan) County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 6 PM EST Monday. Localized minor flooding possible with tonight`s high tide. Minor flooding expected with the Monday afternoon high tide. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy rainfall and/or runoff coinciding with tonight and Monday afternoon`s high tides will exacerbate street and property flooding issues along the coast. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. NEW YORK HARBOR AT THE BATTERY NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.0 FT, MODERATE 8.3 FT, MAJOR 9.4 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.9 FT, MODERATE 3.2 FT, MAJOR 4.3 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 18/12 AM 6.5/ 7.0 1.4/ 1.9 2.2/ 2.7 2 NONE 18/12 PM 7.5/ 8.0 2.3/ 2.8 2.6/ 3.1 1-3 MINOR 19/01 AM 4.5/ 5.0 -0.7/-0.2 0.2/ 0.7 1-2 NONE 19/01 PM 4.6/ 5.1 -0.6/-0.1 -0.2/ 0.3 1 NONE 20/02 AM 4.7/ 5.2 -0.5/ 0.0 0.2/ 0.7 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
